title: Risen Leaden Champions 1v1 League Week 4 this Friday!

embed.description: Welcome to the Risen Leaden Champions II (RLCII) 1v1 League of Legends tournament!With the RLC II, we are introducing a...

body:
Hello everyone! Risen eSports will be hosting the RLC 1v1 Tournament Week 4onight @ 6PM AEST!
This is an opportunity to prove yourself as the greatest player in OCE (arguably) and take the bragging rights of being RLC champion.
We are aiming for 32 players for this tournament, and a max of 64, this is going to run over 8 weeks, and games will be streamed live.
Prizing:
1st: 3000RP + $100AUD + permanent emote and role on our discord
2nd: 2400RP
3rd: 1800RP
4th: 1200RP
5th-8th: 600RP

& an additional 10AUD for the 1st place winner of each week

To sign-up and learn more, please refer to the link:
https://battlefy.com/risen/rlc-ii-risen-leaden-champions-1v1-league-week-4/5cb5930f0795b803445dfeb1/info?infoTab=details
Discords:
https://discord.gg/mWhdpdm 
https://discord.gg/RcyUX9A 
Thankyou, we hope to see you there with us tonight!
If you do have any inquiries, do feel free to ask me about them.
